name: BATTLE X
description: You will play as Marcus, and save the world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: - Additional Notes: -
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit Processor: intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: - Additional Notes: -
